description:
A delivery source is an AWS resource that sends logs to an AWS destination. The destination can be CloudWatch Logs, Amazon S3, or Kinesis Data Firehose.

Only some AWS services support being configured as a delivery source. These services are listed as Supported [V2 Permissions] in the table at [Enabling logging from AWS services](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudWatch/latest/logs/AWS-logs-and-resource-policy.html).

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies this delivery source.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies this delivery source.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 16  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws[a-zA-Z-]*)?:[A-Za-z0-9][A-Za-z0-9_/.-]{0,62}:[A-Za-z0-9_/.-]{0,63}:[A-Za-z0-9_/.-]{0,63}:[A-Za-z0-9][A-Za-z0-9:_/+=,@.-]{0,1023}$  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.description: The unique name of the Log source.
Name.markdownDescription:
The unique name of the Log source.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 60  
Pattern: [\w-]*$  
Update requires: Replacement

ResourceArn.description: The ARN of the resource that will be sending the logs.
ResourceArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the resource that will be sending the logs.

---

Required: No  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption

LogType.description: The type of logs being delivered. Only mandatory when the resourceArn could match more than one. In such a case, the error message will contain all the possible options.
LogType.markdownDescription:
The type of logs being delivered. Only mandatory when the resourceArn could match more than one. In such a case, the error message will contain all the possible options.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: [\w-]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: The tags that have been assigned to this delivery source.
Tags.markdownDescription:
The tags that have been assigned to this delivery source.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies this delivery source.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies this delivery source.

---

Required: No  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption

ResourceArns.description: This array contains the ARN of the AWS resource that sends logs and is represented by this delivery source. Currently, only one ARN can be in the array.
ResourceArns.markdownDescription:
This array contains the ARN of the AWS resource that sends logs and is represented by this delivery source. Currently, only one ARN can be in the array.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Service.description: The AWS service that is sending logs.
Service.markdownDescription:
The AWS service that is sending logs.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: [\w-]*$  
Update requires: No interruption
